name: MovieClub
short: A cog for scheduling and voting on movie nights.
description: This cog allows users to vote on a date for movie night and the movie to watch. It uses Discord buttons for voting and can optionally use modals for entering movie information.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for intalling the MovieClub cog! I hope it helps you connect with your friends.
author: zr
